name: Azumarill
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: It lives in rivers and lakes. In water, its coloring and patterns trick the vision of foes.

attacks.name: Defense Curl
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Azumarill during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Bubble Pump
attacks.effect: If Azumarill has 3 or more Energy attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage. If Azurill is anywhere under Azumarill, flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
